    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21291047">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21291047">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21291047">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Is my article Peer-Reviewed?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10131969">
          <p>
           Journal articles that are peer-reviewed have been critiqued by other experts before publication.
          </p>
          <p>
           To determine if an article is peer-reviewed or not, you need to check if the
           <strong>
            journal
           </strong>
           in which the article was published is peer-reviewed. You can do this by using the database
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/">
            Ulrich's web
           </a>
           . For instance, in the following citation:
          </p>
          <p>
           Barthlott, W, Wiersch, S, Čolić, Z, &amp; Koch, K 2009, 'Classification of trichome types within species of the water fern Salvinia, and ontogeny of the egg-beater trichomes',
           <i>
            Botany
           </i>
           , 87, 9, pp. 830-836.
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Botany
           </em>
           is the journal title. Using
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/">
            Ulrich's web
           </a>
           , type in the name of the journal, in this case&nbsp;
           <em>
            Botany.
           </em>
           (Do NOT enter the title of the article.) If the journal is listed as "refereed" (another word for peer-reviewed), your article is in a peer-reviewed journal. Therefore, most articles in this journal will be peer-reviewed. Exceptions to peer-reviewed articles in a peer-reviewed journal include news items, commentaries, and letters to the editor.
          </p>
          <p>
           In some databases, such as
           <em>
            Academic Search Complete
           </em>
           , you can click on the name of the journal and the database will list information about the journal, including if the journal is peer-reviewed or not. Other databases allow you to limit to see only results that are peer-reviewed. To determine if you can limit to peer-reviewed journals, look in the database's help section.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10131969" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12324431">
              <a id="link_12324431" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12324431,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12324431}); ">
               Ulrich's Web
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ulrich's Directory is a database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is refereed or not (refereed is another word for peer-reviewed) on international periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10379706">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10379706">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10379706">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search for General Background Information on Your Topic
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_27" id="content10379706">
          <div id="boxatt10379706" class="boxatt">
           <script type="text/javascript" src="/js112/credo_search_box.js">
            &lt;script type="text/javascript"&gt;
                        var CS_10379706;
           </script>
           <style>
            #credo_search_content_10379706 { font-family: Arial; }
                        .credo_search_button {
                            color: white;
                            background-color: #B3B0D4;
                            border: 1px solid #888;
                            font-weight: bolder;
                            padding: 2px;
                            font-size: 100%;
                            letter-spacing: 1px;
                            margin-left: 6px;
                        }
                        .credo_search_button:hover {
                            color: #66C;
                        }
           </style>
           <div id="credo_search_box_10379706">
            <div>
             <label for="searchText10379706">
              <img src="//search.credoreference.com/images/app/school_search/credo_logo.20d565f9.png" alt="Credo Reference Search" />
             </label>
            </div>
            <div style="padding-top: 5px;">
             <form name="frm_credo_search_10379706" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;" onsubmit="return false;">
              <input name="txt_credo_search10379706" id="txt_credo_search10379706" type="text" style="width: 125px;" onkeypress="function submitCSSearch(e){var evtobj=window.event?event:e;var keycode=evtobj.keyCode;if (keycode == 13) {CS_10379706.Search();}}submitCSSearch(event);" value="" />

             </form>
            </div>
           </div>

          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10380126">
          <div id="boxatt10380126" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10380126">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10380126" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10380126').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21657641">
          <div id="boxatt21657641" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25147255">
              <a id="link_25147255" href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/jarson/pub_health_law.pdf" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25147255,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25147255}); ">
               Public Health and the Law
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10106444">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10106444">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10106444">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10106444">
          <div id="boxatt10106444" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24783792">
              <a id="link_24783792" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783792,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286450}); ">
               PubMed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A service of the National Library of Medicine, PubMed includes over 19 million citations for biomedical articles back to 1948 and links to many sites providing full text articles and other related resources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12293996">
              <a id="link_12293996" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12293996,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286439}); ">
               Science Direct, Health, Life, and Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences from 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12294002">
              <a id="link_12294002" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12294002,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286445}); ">
               Springerlink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,700 journals from Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12294009">
              <a id="link_12294009" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12294009,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24783793">
              <a id="link_24783793" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24783793,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10106476">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10106476">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10106476">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10106476">
          <div id="boxatt10106476" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24797524">
              <a id="link_24797524" href="http://me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com/log?L=ME9QJ4AJ8Y&amp;D=TPU&amp;J=AMERJOUROFPU&amp;P=EJP&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fajph.aphapublications.org%2Floi%2Fajph" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24797524,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24797524}); ">
               American Journal of Public Health
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24797531">
              <a id="link_24797531" href="http://me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com/log?L=ME9QJ4AJ8Y&amp;D=RAR&amp;J=ANNUREVOFPU&amp;P=EJP&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.annualreviews.org%2Floi%2Fpublhealth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24797531,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24797531}); ">
               Annual Review of Public Health
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12294172">
              <a id="link_12294172" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/journals/182/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12294172,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12294172}); ">
               British Medical Journal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The British Medical Journal (under various titles) with full text from 1840-2008.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12294091">
              <a id="link_12294091" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/1124917?databaseList=1708&amp;databaseList=638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12294091,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12294091}); ">
               Journal of the American Medical Association (JAMA)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of the Journal of the American Medical Association from 1883-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12294035">
              <a id="link_12294035" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/1644869?databaseList=1708&amp;databaseList=638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12294035,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12287063}); ">
               Science Online
              </a>
              &nbsp;&nbsp;
              <div id="popupinfo12294035" class="popupdiv">
              </div>
              <a href="#" onclick="cursorXY(event); showAlert(250,3,12287063,0); return false;" title="More Information">
               <div class="b_moreinfo">
                &nbsp;&nbsp;
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Access the journal Science from the years 1800-2004 online, or access 2004-present (paper copies of the journal) on level B of the library at call number 505s1.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21293002">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21293002">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21293002">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21293002">
          <div id="boxatt21293002" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24798824">
              <a id="link_24798824" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24798824,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24798824}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24798826">
              <a id="link_24798826" href="http://www.nytimes.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24798826,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23576209}); ">
               New York Times
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Complete access to New York Times via Muhlenberg subscription. All users must register while physically on campus, using their Muhlenberg email.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24798825">
              <a id="link_24798825" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24798825,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24798825}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24798827">
              <a id="link_24798827" href="http://news.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24798827,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776525}); ">
               Google news
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Aggregated news from worldwide sources
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">

          <tr>

            <h2>
             Subject Guide
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63915">
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile.php?uid=63915" title="View Profile">

             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Rachel Hamelers
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="profilecontent">

              </b>

              <br />

      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21669128">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21669128">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21669128">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Healthy People 2020
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content21669128">
          <p>
           Healthy People 2020 sets ambitious 10-year goals for improving the Nation&rsquo;s health. Each goal is supported by primary literature articles that are indexed in PubMed. The site also serves as a portal for data resources.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21669128" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25159891">
              <a id="link_25159891" href="http://www.healthypeople.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25159891,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25159891});">
               Healthy People 2020 Homepage
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25159894">
              <a id="link_25159894" href="http://www.healthypeople.gov/2020/data-search/Search-the-Data" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25159894,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25159894});">
               Healthy People 2020 Data Search
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25159896">
              <a id="link_25159896" href="http://www.phpartners.org/hp2020" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25159896,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25159896});" onmouseover='showLinkDesc(event,&squot;Click on the objective that interests you. On the next screen, next to the subtopic that interests you, click on the "PubMed Search" box.&squot;,200,2);' onmouseout="hideLinkDesc();">
               Structured Evidence Queries
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25161182">
              <a id="link_25161182" href="https://phpartners.org/tutorial/04-ebph/2-keyConcepts/4.2.5.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25161182,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Public Health Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25161182});">
               Steps in Searching and Evaluating the Literature
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
